attributes.action: pass an act of parliament prohibiting the playing of music from speakers and playing of loud music through headphones on public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of Great Britain, ask the Prime Minister Gordon Brown, to pass an Act of Parliament which makes the playing of music, or of other audio, from the loudspeaker(s) of mobile phones, or other audio devices on Public Transport to be a criminal offence.
